result.eng: A car made by Volvo.
result.ga: carr de dhéantús volvo
result.orig: Carr de dhéantús Volvo
result.html: carr de dhéantús volvoA car made by Volvo.
result.ponchtml: carr de ḋéantús volvoA car made by Volvo.

result.eng: One of these cars was stolen.
result.ga: goideadh ceann de na carranna seo
result.orig: Goideadh ceann de na carranna seo
result.html: goideadh ceann de na carranna seoOne of these cars was stolen.
result.ponchtml: goideaḋ ceann de na carranna seoOne of these cars was stolen.

result.eng: Watch the car!
result.ga: coimhéad an carr
result.orig: Coimhéad an carr
result.html: coimhéad an carrWatch the car!
result.ponchtml: coiṁéad an carrWatch the car!

result.eng: How many cars does he have?
result.ga: cá mhéad carr atá aige
result.orig: Cá mhéad carr atá aige
result.html: cá mhéad carr atá aigeHow many cars does he have?
result.ponchtml: cá ṁéad carr atá aigeHow many cars does he have?

result.eng: Where did you leave the car?
result.ga: cár fhág tú an carr
result.orig: Cár fhág tú an carr
result.html: cár fhág tú an carrWhere did you leave the car?
result.ponchtml: cár ḟág tú an carrWhere did you leave the car?

result.eng: She got a car as a present.
result.ga: fuair sí carr mar bhronntanas
result.orig: Fuair sí carr mar bhronntanas
result.html: fuair sí carr mar bhronntanasShe got a car as a present.
result.ponchtml: fuair sí carr mar ḃronntanasShe got a car as a present.

result.eng: Follow that car!
result.ga: lean an carr sin
result.orig: Lean an carr sin
result.html: lean an carr sinFollow that car!
result.ponchtml: lean an carr sinFollow that car!

result.eng: I can't afford to buy a new car.
result.ga: ní acmhainn dom carr nua a cheannach
result.orig: Ní acmhainn dom carr nua a cheannach
result.html: ní acmhainn dom carr nua a cheannachI can't afford to buy a new car.
result.ponchtml: ní acṁainn dom carr nua a ċeannaċI can't afford to buy a new car.

result.eng: They can't live without a car.
result.ga: ní féidir leo maireachtáil gan charr
result.orig: Ní féidir leo maireachtáil gan charr
result.html: ní féidir leo maireachtáil gan charrThey can't live without a car.
result.ponchtml: ní féidir leo maireaċtáil gan ċarrThey can't live without a car.

result.eng: I haven't paid road tax on that old car.
result.ga: níor íoc mé cáin bhóthair ar an seancharr sin
result.orig: Níor íoc mé cáin bhóthair ar an seancharr sin
result.html: níor íoc mé cáin bhóthair ar an seancharr sinI haven't paid road tax on that old car.
result.ponchtml: níor íoc mé cáin ḃóṫair ar an seanċarr sinI haven't paid road tax on that old car.

result.eng: The car stopped at the corner.
result.ga: stad an carr ag an choirnéal
result.orig: Stad an carr ag an choirnéal
result.html: stad an carr ag an choirnéalThe car stopped at the corner.
result.ponchtml: stad an carr ag an ċoirnéalThe car stopped at the corner.

result.eng: Sit in the car and put the safety belt around yourself.
result.ga: suigh sa charr agus tarraing umat an crios sábhála
result.orig: Suigh sa charr agus tarraing umat an crios sábhála
result.html: suigh sa charr agus tarraing umat an crios sábhálaSit in the car and put the safety belt around yourself.
result.ponchtml: suiġ sa ċarr agus tarraing umat an crios sáḃálaSit in the car and put the safety belt around yourself.

result.eng: He took the car and went.
result.ga: thóg sé an carr agus d'imigh leis
result.orig: Thóg sé an carr agus d'imigh leis
result.html: thóg sé an carr agus d'imigh leisHe took the car and went.
result.ponchtml: ṫóg sé an carr agus d'imiġ leisHe took the car and went.

result.eng: I have the car on loan from a friend of mine.
result.ga: tá an carr ar iasacht agam ó chara liom
result.orig: Tá an carr ar iasacht agam ó chara liom
result.html: tá an carr ar iasacht agam ó chara liomI have the car on loan from a friend of mine.
result.ponchtml: tá an carr ar iasaċt agam ó ċara liomI have the car on loan from a friend of mine.

result.eng: There is something wrong with this car.
result.ga: tá rud éigin cearr leis an charr seo
result.orig: Tá rud éigin cearr leis an charr seo
result.html: tá rud éigin cearr leis an charr seoThere is something wrong with this car.
result.ponchtml: tá rud éigin cearr leis an ċarr seoThere is something wrong with this car.

result.eng: This man has a house, a car and a lot of money.
result.ga: tá teach carr agus a lán airgid ag an fhear seo
result.orig: Tá teach carr agus a lán airgid ag an fhear seo
result.html: tá teach carr agus a lán airgid ag an fhear seoThis man has a house, a car and a lot of money.
result.ponchtml: tá teaċ carr agus a lán airgid ag an ḟear seoThis man has a house, a car and a lot of money.

result.eng: Máire has a car.
result.ga: tá carr ag máire
result.orig: Tá carr ag Máire
result.html: tá carr ag máireMáire has a car.
result.ponchtml: tá carr ag máireMáire has a car.

result.eng: Does she have a car?
result.ga: an bhfuil carr aici
result.orig: An bhfuil carr aici
result.html: an bhfuil carr aiciDoes she have a car?
result.ponchtml: an ḃfuil carr aiciDoes she have a car?

result.eng: I have a bruise here. That is the place where I hit my hand on the car door.
result.ga: tá ballbhrú orm anseo sin an áit ar bhuail mé mo lámh ar dhoras an chairr
result.orig: Tá ballbhrú orm anseo Sin an áit ar bhuail mé mo lámh ar dhoras an chairr
result.html: tá ballbhrú orm anseo sin an áit ar bhuail mé mo lámh ar dhoras an chairrI have a bruise here. That is the place where I hit my hand on the car door.
result.ponchtml: tá ballḃrú orm anseo sin an áit ar ḃuail mé mo láṁ ar ḋoras an ċairrI have a bruise here. That is the place where I hit my hand on the car door.

result.eng: Well, take the car there tomorrow.
result.ga: bhuel tabhair an carr seo ann amárach
result.orig: Bhuel tabhair an carr seo ann amárach
result.html: bhuel tabhair an carr seo ann amárachWell, take the car there tomorrow.
result.ponchtml: ḃuel taḃair an carr seo ann amáraċWell, take the car there tomorrow.
